reviewText:
This instructional video was created by an experienced computer technologies instructor and adult services librarian (me).

Designed for "computer shy" folks of all ages, this computer help video gently guides the viewer through creating a Gmail email account; sending & receiving email messages; basic Gmail operations; and how to send and save email photos (a question that I got *a lot* when I was a public librarian).

Step-by-step instructions combined with video demonstrations.
